summary: Hey guys this is a Playerhouse in front of the stonewall at whiterun. Basically the house has 2 rooms. The rooms are small but very comfortable.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys this is a Playerhouse in front of the stonewall at whiterun. Basically the house has 2 rooms. The rooms are small but very comfortable. In front of the house you have a stable for your house.

If anything is bugging leave a comment below!

Installation:
1) Manual download: Download the .zip file then extract the .zip and drag the .esp file in your skyrim DATA folder.
X:/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data

ENJOY :D

2) Nexus Downloader: Klick on the button at the top of this site which says 'Download NMM' (http://gyazo.com/98b80a6d294ff8faaab6c1493d740d9b).

ENJOY :D

____________________________________________________________________________________________

When you have any question leave a comment or visit my YTub-channel!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQz8n1d2Y1q_x53pBDXl0Jg
author: HeroArt
